title: Rehabilitation, Ageing and Independent Living Research Centre
description: RAIL Research Centre is dedicated to improving how people live, with greater independence and quality of life. We're transforming approaches to health, aged care, disability and support services to meet Australia's future needs.
sitename: Rehabilitation, Ageing and Independent Living (RAIL) Research Centre
cleaned_text: Rehabilitation, Ageing and Independent Living Research Centre We're transforming approaches to health, aged care, disability and support services to meet Australia's future needs. We're part of the [School of Primary and Allied Health Care](https://www.monash.edu/medicine/spahc). [](https://www.monash.edu/medicine/spahc/rail/about) [About RAIL](https://www.monash.edu/medicine/spahc/rail/about) RAIL Research Centre is dedicated to improving how people live, with greater independence and quality of life. [Research](https://www.monash.edu/medicine/spahc/rail/research) Our centre focuses on three streams of research to bring the biggest benefit to the community. [RAIL Partners](https://www.monash.edu/medicine/spahc/rail/partnerships) We're driving change in our community by partnering with industry, community and government. [](https://www.monash.edu/medicine/spahc/rail/members) [RAIL Members](https://www.monash.edu/medicine/spahc/rail/members) We bring together expertise across Monash in rehabilitation, ageing and independent living.
